adrFormatAddress: 877 Park Ave, New York, NY 10075, USA

originalText.text:
I’ve been a patient of Dr Lallas for about 20 years. You could not find a more caring, smarter physician in my case for oncology gynecology.
He is gentle, explains everything and evokes total confidence in him for his expertise. If I moved out of state, I would fly home to maintain my status as one of his patients

text.text:
I’ve been a patient of Dr Lallas for about 20 years. You could not find a more caring, smarter physician in my case for oncology gynecology.
He is gentle, explains everything and evokes total confidence in him for his expertise. If I moved out of state, I would fly home to maintain my status as one of his patients

originalText.text:
Dr. Lallas is the best in his field of Gynecology Oncology. He is thorough and meticulous in his examinations. He is personable and explains your diagnosis in detail!!
Great surgeon, awesome bedside manners!

He calls to follow up with his patients and knows his patients by name.

He has a genuine heart and passion for his patients and career.

text.text:
Dr. Lallas is the best in his field of Gynecology Oncology. He is thorough and meticulous in his examinations. He is personable and explains your diagnosis in detail!!
Great surgeon, awesome bedside manners!

He calls to follow up with his patients and knows his patients by name.

He has a genuine heart and passion for his patients and career.

originalText.text: Caring physician.  Explains everything in detail so you come away not feeling confused.  Follows up with you, as well.  I have been seeing him for over 3 years with a condition that comes and goes (which was explained to me in great detail at our initial meeting).  Very satisfied with my care.
